remarks: ` X ` is a subset of ` CC ` .  This statement is very often used when computing derivatives.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
dvdmsscn.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvdmsscn.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |`t S ) ) $.
dvdmsscn $p |- ( ph -> X C_ CC ) $.
